organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: " It is very possible that Arafat and Netanyahu will meet in Cairo on Saturday .

Let's think step by step.

| Organization |
| --- |
| Arafat (Palestinian Authority or PLO) |
| Netanyahu (Israeli government) |
| Cairo (city) |

Note: It is assumed that "Arafat" refers to Yasser Arafat, the former President of the Palestinian Authority and Chairman of the Palestine Liberation Organization (PLO). Similarly, "Netanyahu" refers to Benjamin Netanyahu, the current Prime Minister of Israel.
